<title level="1" right="Rules">[Precious Material Armor](/Rules.aspx?ID=3170)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Suits of armor made of precious materials are more expensive and sometimes grant special effects. You can make metal armor out of any precious materials except for [duskwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2918), or you can make wooden armor out of duskwood. Because armor’s Bulk is reduced when the armor is worn, use its carried Bulk when determining its material Price. ([Materials are found here](/Rules.aspx?ID=3188).)

[Click here for the Precious Material Armor category page](/Equipment.aspx?Category=11&Subcategory=12).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
